document.discussion_title: Canadians Winnie Harlow, The Weeknd Shine In Beyonc√©'s New Album 'Lemonade'
document.topic_text: HuffPost Canada Monday 25th April, 2016 The R&B artist has been rising quickly over the last year, earning two Grammys and five Juno Awards for work on his latest album, "Beauty Behind the Madness." Beyonc? and The Weeknd have been in the same orbit of late, with the Canadian star headlining her husband Jay-Z's Made in America festival in 2015, but this is the first time they have collaborated on a song. On top of the Weeknd, Toronto-born model Winnie Harlow was seen in a promotional video ahead of "Lemonade's" release, and sure enough, she was featured....
